pages.title: Bracelet of the Sea
pages.text: This $(thing)curio$() will allow a $(turtlemancer) to double its potential. Because of this $(item)bracelet$() all spells will be casted faster and will consume less magic of the wand. The $(item)Bracelet of the Sea$() can be obtained performing the $(l)$(l:turtlemancy:rituals/turtle_lovers_rituals#ritual_of_the_sea)Ritual of The Sea$().

pages.title: Ritual of the Sea
pages.description: This ritual will grant you a $(l:turtlemancy:equipment/bracelet_of_the_sea)$(item)Bracelet of the Sea$().
